title: Ticket #3884: possible critical 8.0.2 dagman recovery bug
description:
Peter writes: 

  On recovery, DAGMan appears not to recognize already-completed jobs it has
  logged as completed, causing it to freak out when it sees their children.
  The log below spells it out clearly.


  We're testing now to confirm that this /doesn't/ happen in 8.0.1, but we
  know it does happen in 8.0.2.
remarks: Dup of #3882.
creator: tlmiller
